sections.text: Servitude on undivided part.When a co-owner has consented to the establishment of a predial servitude on his undivided part only, the consent of the other co-owners is not required, but the exercise of the servitude is suspended until his divided part is determined at the termination of the state of indivision.Acts 1977, No. 514, ยง1.
